In this article, we're specifically focusing on a .pdf file. Keep in mind however that these steps will apply to all document types, such as .docx, .xlsx, and .pptx. To upload a file using the Joomla 2.5 media manager: 1  Log into your Joomla 2.5 admin. 2  In the top menu, hover over Content and then click Media Manager. 3  In the left menu under Media Folders, navigate to the folder where you want to upload the file to by clicking on the individual folders. 4  Upload your file. 5  After navigating to the folder where you ... 1 Find the file on your computer, select it by clicking on it, and then click Open. 2  Finally click Start Upload. 3  After the file has been uploaded, you will see a message similar to: 4  Upload Complete: /pdfs/my-pdf-file.pdf. 5  If you need to link to this file, you need to find the path to it.
